meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Catherine Radford Chris Long Mike Lewis Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6615.

td.p: Catherine Radford, a property manager from Charlestown, Massachusetts
Chris Long, a human resources director from Thousand Oaks, California
Mike Lewis, a systems engineer from Bloomington, Minnesota (whose 1-day cash winnings total $35,000)

tr.td: GETTIN' PIGGY WITH IT
HISTORY'S ODDS & ENDS
WE'LL NEED THE "RENT"
THE RICHEST PERSON IN THE STATE
WRITERS AT REST
JOCK-ULARITY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Winston Churchill reportedly said, "I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as" this')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue
